entry.title: Deal With Blocked googleapis.com
entry.content:
由于众所周知的原因，googleapis.com在中国大陆无法访问，但是仍有很多国内外网站的公共库和字体文件仍托管在googleapi上，造成大量网站在加载时出现延迟和静态资源404错误。

###Solution
将对googleapis.com 的访问重定向到360提供的google公共库和字体库CDN：

  1. 下载安装chrome浏览器的Switcheroo Redirector插件
  2. 制定如下重定向规则

注：通过修改hosts文件将googleapis.com的访问解析到useso.com的IP地址是无效的
entry.summary: 由于众所周知的原因，googleapis.com在中国大陆无法访问，但是仍有很多国内外网站的公共库和字体文件仍托管在googleapi上，造成大量网站在加载时出现延迟和静态资源404错误。

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
It’s a new start !
Will I keep writing the blog? God knows.

Shall I compare thee to a Summers day ?
Thou art more lovely and more temperate
Rough winds do shake the darling buds of Maie,
And summers lease hath all too short a date:
Sometime too hot the eye of heaven shines,
And often is his gold complexion dimm’d, 　　　　
And every faire from faire some-time declines,
By chance, or natures changing course vntrim’d:
But thy eternall Summer shall not fade,
Nor loose possession of that faire thou ow’st, 　　　　
Nor shall death brag thou wandr’st in his shade, 　　　　
When in eternall lines to time thou grow’st,
So long as men can breath or eyes can see,
So long as lives this, and this gives life to thee.
entry.summary:
It’s a new start !
Will I keep writing the blog? God knows.
